headline: Inside Madaya: Videos show suffering of starving in Syrian town
content: By Nick Paton Walsh, CNNUpdated 1748 GMT (0148 HKT) January 26, 2016 The video in this story is difficult to watch, but CNN believes it is important that people see it. We have verified the images in it were shot recently in the town of Madaya, but cannot independently confirm the medical issues of those featured in it (CNN)The world's attention may have moved on, and the aid convoys driven away, but in besieged Madaya, now caught in the bitterly cold grip of ice and snow, people are still starving.
